waves.rationale: US-001 creates SpaceNavigation.svelte and establishes the navigation contract. Must complete first as US-002 depends on understanding the navigation structure, and US-003 will integrate this component.

US-002 creates individual nav button components (src/lib/components/spaces/nav/*.svelte). US-004 modifies pageStore (src/lib/stores/pages.svelte.ts). Different file trees, no overlap. US-004 is marked completed but included for analysis. Both can run in parallel.

US-003 integrates SpaceNavigation into SpaceDashboard (modifies src/lib/components/spaces/SpaceDashboard.svelte). US-007 creates API endpoint (src/routes/api/spaces/[space]/pages/+server.ts). Different files - frontend component vs backend API. US-007 is marked completed. Can run in parallel.

US-005 modifies PagesNavButton (src/lib/components/spaces/nav/PagesNavButton.svelte). US-006 creates page route loader (src/routes/spaces/[space]/pages/+page.ts). US-016 modifies pageStore (src/lib/stores/pages.svelte.ts). All different files, no conflicts. US-004 and US-016 both touch pageStore but US-016 adds different methods. US-016 marked completed. Can run in parallel.

US-013 creates/modifies PageCard (src/lib/components/pages/PageCard.svelte). US-014 creates SelectAreaModal (src/lib/components/pages/SelectAreaModal.svelte). US-015 creates PageEmptyState (src/lib/components/pages/PageEmptyState.svelte). All different component files, can run in parallel.

US-009 creates RecentlyEditedSection (src/lib/components/pages/RecentlyEditedSection.svelte). US-011 creates PageFilterBar (src/lib/components/pages/PageFilterBar.svelte). US-012 creates PagesGrid (src/lib/components/pages/PagesGrid.svelte). All separate component files, can run in parallel.

US-010 creates AllPagesSection which composes PageFilterBar (US-011), PagesGrid (US-012), and PageEmptyState (US-015). Must wait for those components to exist. Modifies src/lib/components/pages/AllPagesSection.svelte.

US-008 creates the main dashboard component (src/routes/spaces/[space]/pages/+page.svelte) that composes RecentlyEditedSection (US-009), AllPagesSection (US-010), and SelectAreaModal (US-014). Must wait for all child components to exist. Integration dependency.

US-017 updates page creation flows across the codebase to add optimistic updates. Requires US-008 dashboard to exist for end-to-end testing of the ?created={id} flow. Must search codebase for all page creation locations and modify them.

US-018 adds loading states to +page.svelte and PagesGrid. US-019 adds accessibility improvements across all components. US-020 adds mobile responsiveness testing/fixes across all components. These are enhancement passes that touch different concerns (loading, a11y, mobile). While they may touch the same files, they modify different aspects (loading logic, aria attributes, CSS). Can be done in parallel with careful merge management or serialize if preferred. Setting parallel for analysis but this is a judgment call - serializing would be safer.

risks: US-018, US-019, US-020 in Wave 10 all touch similar components (dashboard, cards, grids) but modify different aspects. Parallel execution could cause merge conflicts. Recommend serializing if team prefers safety over speed.
US-004 and US-016 both modify pageStore (pages.svelte.ts) but are in different waves and add different methods. Should be safe but watch for conflicts if methods interact.

US-003 integrates SpaceNavigation before US-005 wires the page count to PagesNavButton. US-003 will pass taskCount/pageCount/memberCount props, but pageCount won't be reactive until US-005. Functional but not fully wired.
US-017 searches codebase for page creation flows - scope is unclear until implementation. May touch files modified in earlier waves.
Three stories marked as completed (US-001, US-004, US-007, US-016) are included in analysis but should be verified as actually complete before executing subsequent waves.
